entry.def: The sun is the ball of fire in the sky that the Earth goes round, and that gives us heat and light.

example.ex: The sun was now high in the southern sky...
example.tran: 太阳正高挂在南边的天空上。

entry.tran: 太阳的光和热;日光;阳光
entry.def: You refer to the light and heat that reach us from the sun as the sun .

example.ex: Dena took them into the courtyard to sit in the sun...
example.tran: 德娜带他们到院子里晒太阳。

example.ex: They were trying to soak up some sun.

entry.def: If you are sunning yourself, you are sitting or lying in a place where the sun is shining on you.

example.ex: She was last seen sunning herself in a riverside park.
example.tran: 最后一次有人看见她时，她正在河边公园晒太阳。

entry.def: A sun is any star which has planets going around it.

entry.tran: 天下万物;世上一切;全世界
entry.def: Everything under the sun means a very great number of things. Anything under the sun means anything at all.

example.ex: We sat there for hours talking about everything under the sun...
example.tran: 我们在那儿坐了几个小时，谈天说地。

example.ex: The fashion-conscious will go for anything under the sun!
